Class Factory

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Component
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Factory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Canvas, Figure, Visitable, Serializable
public class Factory extends Component implements Canvas, Observable
Represents a factory in the robot simulation. A factory contains components, robots, and manages their behavior and simulation state.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
